Topic.Title: Can someone make up an offline save script?

Posts.EditableText:
I notice the online save doesn't work on games long enough to require saving, for most players I've spoken with, probably because of data speeds and connection.
If I wanted to make a really long game, or even a moderately long game, could there be a script I could add so that people could save offline after downloading, and come back to whatever part they had left bookmarked?
I would like to use something like that, even if it meant the game would not start over again.
